#summary Installation of Plugin Rarekiller.

= Installation of Rarekiller =
  * Make sure you have the latest version of [http://www.thebuddyforum.com/releases/ Honorbuddy]
  * Extract the ZIP in your Honorbuddy/Plugins folder
http://pluginrarekiller.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/InstallRarekiller.JPG
  * start HB and enable the Plugin on the Plugin Tap
http://pluginrarekiller.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/PluginsTap.JPG
  * Press Button Settings and Config the Plugin with the Config Window and press Save. [DescriptionConfigWindow Link to Description of the Config Window]
  * Enable Automatically Dismount in WOW
http://pluginrarekiller.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/autodismount.JPG
  * If you want the Bot to use the Slowfall-Abillity, double check your Settings and additional test if it works correct by manually dismounting above the ground (for example over a lake).
  * *Hint:* If you made changes in the Configwindow, you always have to save them before the Bot will use them.
  * Choose a Botbase, load a valid [Profiles Profile] if neccessary and Press Start
